name: Bonsai Armory
description:
Bonsai Armory is a 3D gunsmithing simulator where you can try out different gun setups without getting hands on real firearms.

Features

In Bonsai Armory, you can:

  • Replace barrel, grip, stock, and other components.
  • Place modular accessories (such as picatinny and  m-lok parts)  onto any slot you like.
  • Save current setup as preset and compare your setups by switching presets. (You can save up to 8 presets.)

Supported Firearms

Currently supported firearm is

  • AKM

AR-15 Platform is planned to be added.

Examples

We need feedback from users! 

 Leave a comment and feedback if you like this project!  Send feedback and feature request on  community section below and  @k4rmax_.

Notes

Mobile device support is quite limited.
